org.nosco
Class QueryFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.nosco.QueryFactory

public class QueryFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This is a relatively uninteresting factory class that you will likely never use.   Please look at the generated TableName.ALL objects for starting your queries.   (DataSources can be specified with TableName.ALL.use(ds))

Author:
dander
